1.content:
It is your first day of college and you're heading towards your very first class! You remember your friends telling you that in college there are a lot of really cute girls! This was going to be a good semester!
"Ouch"!!
While day dreaming about girls you accidentally bumped into one!! "Great" you thought, that's one less girl i'll have a chance with...
You look at the damaged you have caused and see if you can help in any way. "Sorry, i wasn't paying attention" you explained nervously.
"It's alright!" She said vibrantly as she bent over to pick up her books that you had caused her to drop.
"My name is Robyn!"
You couldn't help but stare at her tight jeans for what seemed like an eternity before realizing that you had caused this. So you finally got down and started to help her pick up her books.
"Hey, i'm (INSERT NAME!!! duh =P)... So what class are you heading to Robyn?"
"Oh me?" *giggle* "Just freshman biology! How about you cutie?"
You couldn't help but get a little red when she said this, but you had it in your head that you wanted to play the "cool" and "laid-back" guy, so you quickly regained your composure. You flipped through your schedule and noted that you were also in Freshman biology! What a happy coincidence!
"Huh, i'm also in biology!" you explain.
"Wow that's awesome! Want to be lab buddies?" She asked
You thought about this for a second.... What could be a better start to your day then meeting up with a really cute girl who is in the same class as you and wants to be your lab buddy??
"Sure, sounds good to me!" You say!
1.title: College life

12.content:
"Wow", You and Robyn both say at the same time.
*Laughs* "Yeah exactly what i was thinking" Said Robyn "That was a really hard class... i'm not sure i fully understand it"
"No joke...And the teacher is giving us an exam next class to see what we already know about biology.. I just don't understand why teachers give tests the very next class meeting!" You say, getting a little upset at the difficulty of the class.
"Yeah...It's going to be a toughy!" Says Robyn who is clearly thinking about something now...
You know college has a lot of cute girls in it but you are still going to it for the class credits and to eventually get your degree, but this doesnt stop you from wanting to still have fun.
"HEY!" yells Robyn, "Want to come over and have a "study" session?!!? It'll be great! i just moved into my new apartment last week and everything is already set up! We can get ready for this test tomorrow!"
Could this be? a invitation from a girl on the very first day of meeting her? And one that is also super hot!
"Yeah" You say "Just let me check my schedu-"
She walks up to you and pulls you by your belt so that your front is pulled towards hers. She locks eyes with you and you can't help but be dazed by her beauty. She has the greenest eyes you have ever seen and her breathe is warm and fresh.
She says slowly so that you can feel her talking..."I know you were looking when i dropped my books on purpose, so come on! it'll fun!"
Then she slips a piece of paper into your bag and walks off. You stand there awe-struck at what just happened... and you watch Robyn walk away. Your gaze slipping up and down her body... And you finally start looking at her butt when she turns around....you look back up at her face and she winks and keeps on walking.
Now then...
12.title: After Class!

121.content:
You arrive at your place after an eventful day and you set all your things down on your bed. After flopping down on your bed you reach into your bag and look at the note which Robyn wrote you...
"1555 Sugarcove LN. appt. # 21
- Come over to my place tonight so we can get to know each other better and we can study biology
Robyn" She had kissed the paper where she signed it so her lip imprint was on it (and it looked like she used her tongue a little?? you couldn't tell).

You read the note over and over again...and this was really happening! Your heart raced as thoughts went through your head as what this nice, curved, and assertive girl was going to do to you when you arrived.. She was taller than you with brown hair and green eyes. She had a nice complexion and an even greater personality! But it was weird, you somehow felt connected with her on a deeper level without even meeting her... uh well! you just couldn't wait any longer! So you got your things ready and left towards Robyn's place!

Driving down the street you noticed that she didn't live very far from you, since most college kids live close to the campus anyways, You pull up to her apartment complex and see that there is a gate, but you don't worry about it - you just follow another driver inside.... you park and walk up to her door. On the ground there is a place mat which you notice says "I enjoy the little things in life"... You just shrug it off and proceed to knock on the door.

You hear the locks turning as she says "just a minute!!" Then the door opens and there she is.... her hair is undone so it is flowing, she changed into a tight shirt and deep blue jeans with faded areas. You can see in the background of her apartment that it is really clean and she has some music playing...
"Hey Robyn! So should we get started with biology?" you say
She looks at you with a devious look and says "Suurree". Then she turns around and walks slowly into her room....
You walk in and...
121.title: Robyn's Place

1211.content:
You enter this Feisty college girls house cautiously, but already knowing what the outcome will most likely be. You close the door behind you and proceed to walk straight back to where her bedroom is. As you walk you pass the kitchen, which still has a box of silverware that needed to be unpacked, and you pass the living room, which had a t.v. on the wall with a yoga mat on the ground in front of it (kinky). You make the turn entering her room and you see her just sitting on her bed swinging her legs...
"Nice place" You say
"Thanks!! Hehe yeah i just moved in but i pretty much have it the way i want it!"
"So where should we do this?" You ask nervously
"Well just take a seat in that chair first, it's by that bookcase"
"Will-do!" you say without hesitation
You walk past her and you can tell she is checking you out. So you pretend to be macho and make all the cheesy gestures you can until you reach the chair, then you finally sit down, pretending to be exhausted from walking 10 steps. "Man! make me sit ALL the WAY over here!!" you say jokingly.
"Sorry!" She says in a flirty-manner.
Robyn Then stands up and walks right in front of you, "So should we get started on this biology study session?" She says sarcastically
"Yeah" You say playing along "But i forgot my book at my house ACCIDENTLY"
She looks at you and smiles slightly, "That's okay cutie, i have mine here" She says as she turns arounds. She is now standing directly in front of you with her back turned to you, and there's no way you can't look at her gorgeous butt. The way the jeans are faded in a way to draw your attention doesn't help...neither does the fact that she knows all of this and is expecting you to be drawn in.
Robyn then bends over and reaches for a pile of books on the bottom shelf of her bookcase (you cant help but to think that she placed it there purposefully...but who cares!).
"I know it's here somewhere!!" she says shaking her butt a little to go with the words
"no rush" you say "i'm willing to wait because i love biology THAT MUCH"
She finally pulled the book out and stood straight up. Your eyes were still entranced by her that you watched the motion all the way up. By the time you looked up she was staring right at your jeans, which were definitely tight at this point...
"Ohh....sorry-" You start to try to explain
"No need to be ashamed! It's biology!" She giggles. Then she turns back towards the book, Sticks her butt straight towards you, and lowers herself upon you... As if you were the new seat. You feel the warm pressure come down on your tight jeans... The way her butt encompasses your lap feels great...
"So i havn't told anyone this before" She says, "But i feel something between us i can't explain, so i might as well tell you..."
You don't entirely know what she is talking about but while she is talking she is swaying back and forth and it feels amazing....so you just sit back and listen..
"...I like to start off a relationship by telling each other our sexual fantasies.... and well... if anything could happen i would want to shrink someone down and play with them... i know it sounds weird and stuff but i feel like i can tell you..." Robyn then stands up and sits down...looking at you...expecting disapointment.
You can't believe what's going on... This girl wants to be in a relationship with you..and that your fantasy would be so close...if not exactly the same as hers.... you say with a little shock
"Robyn, and this might just be my hormones talking... but, i think i love you"...( If anything, one shocking sentence should be covered by another!)
1211.title: To the Room!

12111.content:
She looks at you and smiles!
"I knew you felt it too!" She says "I just couldn't tell what was going on but as soon as i saw you i knew!"
"Yeah... it is hard to explain" You say strangely
"This is great! i love you too!" She giggles "this is a lot to take in" She states, finally calming down.....(or so you think) " I think i need to sit down"
You think to yourself "What?" she is already sitting on the be- Then your thoughts are interrupted by her getting up and sitting on you again. She leans back and kisses you. The aroma of her hair reaches your nose, it smells like strawberries, but your focus is divided between making out with this beautiful girl and her body which is doing a sensual movement on you right now.

She goes into her bathroom and a moment later, she returns with a small device that looks like a phone.

She plugs some numbers into the device and points it at you, The thing makes a slight beeping noise and then stops...

You pass out and everything goes black...
12111.title: True love

121111.content:
You wake up from being hit with a strange device and you look around... You're still sitting on the leather chair which you received that lap dance on earlier... but everything is.....
"BIGGER!!" you yell! "WHAT IS GOING ON!!"
Then from the bottom of the chair's horizon you see Robyn's enormous face come up. It was so perfect when you were normal height but at this new scale you could tell how amazing her complexion really was... and her green eyes really showed from this angle.

You nod...knowing that this is completely insane anyways...

121111.title: Greater Proportion!

info.brief_description: Shrunk at a girl named Robyn's house. The standard shrink story!
info.description: You get invited back to a girl's house after your first day of college and this is where the adventure starts! The main characters are Robyn and you. Feel free to add characters as you see fit. Not restrictions on what you can add just make sure they're gramatically correct and fit with where the story is going. Have fun!
